Whoa! I forgot about Shredder and Mantella, sorry!

::Shredder::

Shredder enters the Destron base, putting Mantella into a CR chamber. He 
activates it, opening a link to all Destrons.

"Hey, I'm back," he says into his comm, "What's been going on?"
